com.karmant.syn

Class AbstractToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karmant.syn.AbstractToken
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleToken, FloatToken, IntToken, LongToken, StringToken

    public abstract class AbstractToken
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by SynBinder to represent a pair of a text position and a value of a token of a particular type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextPos getPos()
      Returns the text position associated with this value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getPos

        public TextPos getPos()
        Returns the text position associated with this value. If this value was produced by a constant grammar element, the position is null. Terminal symbol grammar elements produce values with non-null positions.
        Returns:
        the text position.
